oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Nell Barnes, 1982 August 07, excerpt 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nell Barnes, conducted on 7 August 1982 by Ophelia Paine as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Barnes discusses attending the opening of the Hermitage Hotel in downtown Nashville and the fashions worn by the ladies in attendance. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barnes, Nell (Nellie Marie Gardner), b. 1909--Interviews
Hermitage Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.)
